      • getSpoofedHostName

        public static java.lang.String getSpoofedHostName(java.lang.String host,
                                  java.lang.String alias)
        Determines the spoofed host name to be used when emitting metrics to a gmond process. Spoofed host names are of the form IP:hostname.
        Parameters:
        host - the host of the gmond (ganglia monitor) to which we are connecting, not null
        alias - the custom alias supplied, may be null
        Returns:
        the host name to use when emitting metrics, in the form of IP:hostname
